description: A package that can provide information about available appointment slots within a specific time duration for zero or more attendees.
releaseNotes:
This library includes a meeting calendar class having:
      •  A read-only property to get the list of attendees
      •  Read-only properties to get the current date-time, calendar start date-time and end date-time
      •  A method to add attendees to the Meeting Calendar
      •  A method to append additional attendees to the Meeting Calendar
      •  A method to find all available meeting slots
      •  A method to get the first available meeting slot for a requested meeting duration [Obsolete]
      •  Overloaded methods to find an available time slot for a given duration, within a given time frame
      •  Documented code
      •  Unit tested code with code coverage above 99%


Version 2.3
      •  Interfaces for all public methods and model classes
      •  StartTime and EndTime read-only properties of ICalender introduced
      •  Obsolete GetFirstAvailableSlot method removed

Version 2.2
      •  CurrentTime - A read-only property introduced to get the current date-time calibrated to minutes
      •  GetFirstAvailableSlot - Method marked as obsolete
      •  FindFirstAvailableSlot - Overloaded methods to find an available time slot for a given duration

Version 2.1
      •  Files re-organized
      •  MeetingInfo property of Attendee class renamed to "Meetings"

Version 2.0
      •  Framework version upgraded from .NETStandard 2.1 to net5.0

Version 1.x
       •  Written from ground up using .NETStandard 2.1
       •  No external dependencies
